CustomField.description:
This will be same as Account Name for below scenarios: a. Selected account type is Customer b. One of Account's Sales Areas matches with select product(s)' Sales Area
This will be replace with One-Time customer from Salesforce Order type dete.for below Scenarios: a. Selected account type is Prospect b. If Selected account type is Customer and none of the Account's Sales Areas matches with select product(s)' Sales Area
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Account Name or One-Time Account Name
CustomField.label: Evaluated Sold-To Party
